description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability found in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB Provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-21420):

1. Download the relevant KB update for your Windows version:
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
   - For Windows 10 for x64 Systems: [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)

2. Follow the installation instructions to apply the updates.

3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a vulnerability that could allow remote code execution if an attacker exploits the affected software.
- Ensure that your system is on a supported build prior to applying these updates.
- It is recommended to backup critical data before proceeding with the installation to prevent data loss due to unforeseen issues.
